message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's worth more than $120 to some, but considering your unique needs and preferences, I believe we can come to an agreement. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you with a special offer of $100. This is a fantastic deal, considering the value it brings. Please let me know if you're interested so we can proceed with the transaction.
